verses.verse: If there be a controversy <S%H7379><s%> between men <S%H582><s%>, and they come <S%H5066><s%> unto judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and the judges judge <S%H8199><s%> them <S%H6663><s%>; then they shall justify the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and condemn <S%H7561><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>;

Thou shalt not have in thy bag <S%H3599><s%> diverse weights <S%H68><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> and a small <S%H6996><s%>.
